title: MSI GF63 Thin Hexa Core i5 10th Gen - (8 GB/1 TB HDD/256 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home/4 GB Graphics/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Max Q/60 Hz) GF63 Thin 10SCXR-1616IN / GF63 Thin 10SC-611IN Gaming Laptop  (15.6 inch, Black, 1.86 KG)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, battery, power adapter, user guide
product_specification.Clock Speed: 2.5 GHz with Turbo Boost upto 4.5 GHz
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit IPS Display (60Hz Refresh Rate, 45%NTSC Color Gamut)
product_specification.Included Software: Silver-Lining Print, Cooler Boost, Audio Boost, Dragon Center, Nahimic 3
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 2 Year Warranty Term for Gaming & Content Creation (EU-WE)

product_description.Strong Graphics Performance: This gaming laptop features a GeForce 1650 Max Q to ensure that you get to enjoy a strong graphics performance while using the laptop. You can run modern titles of games with the NVIDIA Turing architecture feature so that you can enjoy a thrilling gaming experience.
product_description.Audio Boost: Thanks to the Hi-resolution Audio feature, you can experience the power of music, movies, and more without any loss.
product_description.SteelSeries Silver-lining Printing Keybo: This laptop features a keyboard that has a SteelSeries silver-lining printing keyboard that ensures aesthetic appeal and a lasting build quality.
product_description.Dragon Center 2.0: You can use the Dragon Center 2.0 feature to enhance the laptop’s gaming performance by customising and freeing up system memories. This way, you can monitor and optimise the laptop.
product_description.Thin Bezel Design: This laptop has a compact chassis that ensures that you get to enjoy immersive gameplay. Thanks to the IPS-level panel, you can get a clear and expansive view of the screen at all angles in great clarity and contrast.
product_description.Quiet Performance: This gaming laptop is designed and tuned to ensure quiet and cool performance even under load. This way, you can enjoy using the laptop without being disturbed or distracting those around you.

review:
Easily one of the most valuable & wonderful gaming laptops out there.

If you are a business user who wants more battery backup, portability & laptop for basic business requirements, then this is not for you.

A few things to know if you are purchasing a gaming laptop for the first time.

- Cooling system is very important for gaming laptop.
- Battery backup is adequate. However, it can be optimised if you work more than play.
- Fans run quiety to moderately all the time. Somewhere you can get around 45 db which is very decent and hardly noticable.

That being said, in this price range, this laptop is brilliant. I have used a macbook air and macbook pro for more than a year. I know what is offered by a premium laptop.

Here is where this laptop beats the air & pro (intel edition 13" inch both):

- The bootup time is simply too good. Also the wakeup from sleep.
- Graphics
- Gaming
- Cooling system.

In all fairness, apple laptops are not gaming laptops but still it makes one feel good about the decision to get this msi.

Regarding gaming experience

I was able to play Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 easily on this machine. That really is something. The game was smooth and didn't lag at all. I didn't get the actual FPS. The laptop did heat up but at the same time, it cooled really well. It went up to 79°C. The cool down after gaming is really fast and efficient.
This flight sim experience was as good as my series X but of course nothing can beat the Series X. I am not a serious gamer. I play probably at max 2-3 titles.

Using the dragon center, you can optimise for gaming, work and other activities like graphic design and programming.

I got this for 58,990 rupees which is a fantastic deal for this specs. I searched about 3 months online in many ecommerce sites.

The only drawback is the keyboard light which is bright red. It would have been better if it was white. (Red is the theme for msi.)

If you are still worried about battery, you can optimise it to suit the requirements. Don't expect too much in the battery segment. Running jupyter notebook and chrome, I got around 2-3 hours. You can probably optimise it the max to reach 4 hours. Beyond that, I am not so sure.

Nvidia is simply outstanding. Once you purchase this laptop, spend time updating windows, nvidia drivers and only then install anything.

It's better to get a good laptop stand for proper cooling and performance.

Really happy with this purchase. Flipkart delivery was fantastic. I got it the very next day.

The display could have been better but it's more than decent and appealing for this price range.

Important Note:- there is no refund system for electronics in flipkart. Only returns and servicing. Make sure you thoroughly search before you decide on a laptop.

Thanks for reading this review.

It's a decent laptop in this price range. I was about to finalize lenovo IdeaPad gaming 3 since I wanted ryzen 5 4600h but then this was offered with SSD and one year extra warranty. Also i510500h is almost matched the benchmark of ryzen 5 4600h, both are hexa cores.
I was concerned about some quality issues in this laptop as reported by some of the reviewers earlier but surprisingly the quality in this one is really good. I noticed that this is manufactured in may 2021. So the stock seems t...
READ MORE

I am writing an honest review after using this laptop for the last 20days, my experience has been great. I will explain all the intricate details of this laptop.
Packaging: I loved the packaging of this laptop, MSI branded cardboard box looks great and the laptop was received in showroom condition with all accessories no complaints, Flipkart did a great job on the delivery as well.
The best part is the factory seal at the bottom of the laptop(as shown in the image) it gives me a lot of confidence that the original laptop components are intact and don't have to worry about purchasing this product through an online channel.
Laptop Performance:
This laptop is a beast considering the price range and performance you can get out of it, it's top of its class laptop for any i5 gaming laptop, coupled with a 4GB graphic card, the SSD version does a great job to speed up the bootup and application startups. You can use this for any graphics work, animation, video editing, or any design software like AutoCAD, And of course gaming. everything works so well, never noticed any lag or hanging issues.
The laptop has got a good cooling mechanism too.
Built-in Software:
MSI Dragon Center- This is a pretty cool software to manage the performance of your laptop and optimize device performance and power consumption
Laptop Ergonomics:
The best point of difference of this laptop is the lightweight compared to other gaming laptops with no compromise on build quality and performance makes it a definite buy.
I personally like the thin bezels, build quality, and keyboard quality with the red lights on them, I like the logo on the lid (wish it had the lighting as well)
Overall, without any second thought of comparisons buy this laptop if you are planning to buy a new one. and trust me you will never regret it.( You have read my review you don't have to search on anything else, I have purchased this after comparing and researching for the last 1 year :p)

A very good gaming laptop with light weight (compared to my last 1) and a good 1080p display. It also has a very simple design not too much gamey. But it is very much fingerprint magnet and if u don't clean it everyday it will leave a print at various places

I have no negatives to say about this laptop. It gives you excellent performance . Gaming is butter smooth and if you can upgrade the Ram memory then it ensures no stuttering . About the power settings if know to configure with msi dragon centre it does not exceed above 70% when gaming and at normal use it stays at 50-55% . If you don't setup the needed power settings it will produce much heat as everyone mentioning here
Games played GTA 5 , Battlefield 1 , Red Dead Redemption 2
Enable cooler booster while gaming and set it in turbo mode therefore less heat and better performance 👍

Only issue is the battey, which can be optimised a little by changing graphic drivers and downloading it from msi support page. Worth the money, must buy.

I agree with most of the previous positive reviews here. It a very good laptop. No doubt about it. However, one thing at I noticed is that the battery backup is the concern.
To improve the battery backup in normal use (My Experience)
1. First thing to do is conduct battery calibration in Dragon Center
a. Update the Dragon Center (if any latest update is available)
b. Plugin the charger
c. Open the Dragon Center
d. Click on tools
e. Click on Battery Calibration
f. Battery calibration will start now, it will charge the battery to 100% (Don’t remove the charger), post that it will discharge to around 5%, post that it will charge again to
100%, after this the calibration is completed (Please don’t use the laptop till the calibration is completed and it will take some time to complete, so I would suggest
doing it when you go for sleep)
2. Change the user scenario to “super battery”
a. Open the Dragon Center
b. Click on home button
c. Click on user scenario
d. Select super battery
3. Update it to Windows 11
4. Change the power mode to “Best power efficiency” (Windows 11)
a. Open windows settings app
b. Select “Power & battery”
c. Select “Best power efficiency” under power mode

Not good
Great laptop

Things to look out for :-

Battery - 3 hours max, Don't expect anything above this even after undervolting

Display : Looks Good but Screen Tearing is insane so you'll always be using Vsync

Keyboard : Very Good Feel, sadly no numpad

Ports : All of em work fine , HDMI is connected to iGPU

Performance : Top Notch 10/10

Charging : Pretty Slow for some reason

Heating : tries to stay stable at 75-80°C but occasionally spikes upto 90°+

Cooling : Cools very fast, make sure to change modes in Dragon Center accordingly. Fan Noise is alright;

Speakers and Drivers : Speakers are amazing and driver support is also great

Note : For Undervolting , you'll have to enable Overclocking in advanced BIOS Settings
Also Hi-Res support is wired only.

Conclusion : If you want to have a very powerful all round machine and don't mind the battery life then go for it

The first impression is fantastic.
It's body is a finger magnet, so you may need to add a sticker to avoid a greasy appearance.
For a gaming laptop, the battery life is adequate. You'll get up to 2.5 to 3 hours of normal use (if you've set battery saver mode in MSI Dragon centre) and 45 to 60 minutes of gaming (I've only tried with GTA V).
Because this is a single-fan laptop, it can get a little bit hot while playing AAA games, but it cools off quickly and has no effect on performance.

On seeing the graphic card with max q design what I thought was that the performance will go up compared to the gtx 1650 but the performance is a bit low. pros.Performance: The Intel hexa core i5 10th gen processor is the highlight of this laptop. It is fast and gives super smooth performance.
pros.Storage: The combination of 1TB HDD and 256GB SSD is excellent. SSD makes the booting quick and gives a smoother experience.
pros.39.62 cm (15.6 inch) 1920 x 1080 Full HD: Awesome display. Supports 4k videos as well.
pros.Cooling: Faster cooling with just one fan which is something exceptional.

cons.3-Cell 51 Whr Battery: Battery backup is just decent enough for a gaming laptop. Gives 4-5 hours for normal use whereas around 2 hours for gaming.

summary.verdict: The MSI GF63 Thin Hexa Core i5 10th Gen is one of the best budget laptops for gamers, designers and programmers.
summary.Additional Information: Expandable RAM, Can be used for coding.
